attributes.action: the removal of Ham from the subway menu due to Muslim demand
attributes.additional_details:
I started this to complain about the fact that Sandwich chain Subway decided to remove Ham from it's menu because of demands from some Muslim group (s). I as a subway customer who likes Ham very much ,have had enough of Muslims making demands to change This Great Country of Ours,,, Great Britain! If Muslims live here, they must conform to our laws! AND messing with my favourite Sandwich from Subway!!!! IF U DON'T LIKE HAM!? DON'T BUY IT!!! YOUR QUITE HAPPY TO SELL US ALCOHOL AND LOTTERY TICKETS IN MOST OF YOUR SHOPS!!! BLOODY HYPOCRITICAL IMBECILES!!!!
PLEASE SIGN N PASS ON? AND KEEP BRITAIN GREAT???? Thanx
